Actions.Name: Bar Brawler
Actions.Description: The Barkeep gains counter and sturdy. Any time a character ends their turn adjacent to the barkeep in this stance, they must save or take 2 piercing damage and be shoved 1. This stance ends at the start of the Barkeep's next turn.

Actions.Name: Barrel Roll
Actions.Description: The Barkeep chooses a direction, ends their turn, then gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, they roll a barrel in a line pattern drawn in that direction from 2-6 spaces. Characters the barrel passes through take [fray] piercing damage and are shoved 1 to either side. When the barrel ends its movement, it explodes for a blast 1 area effect, dealing [D]+[fray] piercing damage and shattering all characters within.
